chart_description: This chart measures the time a CPU is unable to execute any instructions due to lack of resources, specifically some of the processors. This can be caused by a variety of factors such as too many running processes or a lack of memory.

dimension_descriptions.some 10: The average amount of time a CPU is stalled for every 10 seconds.
dimension_descriptions.some 300: The average amount of time a CPU is stalled for every 5 minutes.
dimension_descriptions.some 60: The average amount of time a CPU is stalled for every 1 minute.
